PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-00052023-01-05,  ,  ,  GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Sri Lanka) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (SRI LANKA) REGULATIONS in order to add two (2) individuals individuals to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0004 Publication Date: 2023-01-18
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Sri Lanka) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (SRI LANKA) REGULATIONS in order to add two (2) individuals individuals to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
